name: The Sacred Stone
description: The Sacred Stone has been stolen. Your parents have been killed. Learn the truth about yourself. Wield Magic, Wield a sword, Fight countless Enemies, Monsters Boss fights, explore open worlds, side quests and more. Enemy Combat is fast paced.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: fx-8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1050 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 18 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i-7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1070ti DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 18 GB available space
